actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to refinance the Kennedy Center packing revenue bonds, to establish the "Kennedy Center Performing Arts Fund", and to otherwise encourage the performing arts at the Kennedy Center and elsewhere in the United States.
short_title: Kennedy Center Performing Arts Fund Act
subjects: Federal aid to the arts and humanities

summary.text: Kennedy Center Performing Arts Fund Act - Authorizes the refinancing of revenue bonds issued under the John F. Kennedy Center Act. Establishes in the United States Treasury the Kennedy Center Bond Amortization Account. Directs the Chairman of the National Endowment for the Arts to establish the Kennedy Center Performing Arts Fund to be used solely for the making of Kennedy Center Fund Grants to support productions of the John F. Kennedy Center and in communities which would not otherwise have access to such production.

titles.title: Kennedy Center Performing Arts Fund Act

A bill to refinance the Kennedy Center packing revenue bonds, to establish the "Kennedy Center Performing Arts Fund", and to otherwise encourage the performing arts at the Kennedy Center and elsewhere in the United States.
